DOC.brief_summary: Consecutive living-kidney donor candidates (n=100) will be recruited after being accepted for donation according to official guidelines. An assessment of salt sensitivity, 11 beta HSD activity, 24 hour blood pressure, urine collection and physical exam will be performed prior nephrectomy and 14, 52, 156, 208 days post-nephrectomy.
